title: 161: Rodin's Gates of Hell
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: While "The Gates of Paradise" mark one of the first uses of perspective in sculpture, Rodin's "Gates of Hell," made much later in response, chronicle the existential despair of human suffering, so that's great!
itunes:author: Those three fellas on top of the thing
itunes:subtitle: Still waiting for the gates of purgatory
itunes:summary: While "The Gates of Paradise" mark one of the first uses of perspective in sculpture, Rodin's "Gates of Hell," made much later in response, chronicle the existential despair of human suffering, so that's great!
itunes:title: 161: Rodin's "Gates of Hell"
